content.question: Which of the following indicates whether the number of protons and whether the number of neutrons is greater for the original, unstable nucleus or for the decay products?Number of protonsNumber of neutronsAOriginal nucleusOriginal nucleusBOriginal nucleusDecay productsCDecay productsOriginal nucleusDDecay productsDecay products

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
